question: By which process the Joint State Public Service Commission (JSPSC) is created?
option1: By an act of parliament on the request of the state legislatures concerned
option2: Created by a resolution passed by Rajya Sabha
option3: Created by concerned state legislatures by joint voting
answer: By an act of parliament on the request of the state legislatures concerned
explanation: A Joint State Public Service Commission (JSPSC) for two or more states is created by an act of Parliament of India on the request of the state legislatures concerned. It is a statutory and not a constitutional body.
